name: RDSOptionGroupOptionConfigurations
description: Use the OptionConfigurations property to configure an option and its settings for an AWS::RDS::OptionGroup resource.

properties.name: DBSecurityGroupMemberships
properties.description: A list of database security group names for this option. If the option requires access to a port, the security groups must allow access to that port. If you specify this property, don't specify the VPCSecurityGroupMemberships property.

properties.name: OptionName
properties.description: The name of the option. For more information about options, see Working with Option Groups in the Amazon Relational Database Service User Guide.

properties.name: Port
properties.description: The port number that this option uses.

properties.name: VpcSecurityGroupMemberships
properties.description: A list of VPC security group IDs for this option. If the option requires access to a port, the security groups must allow access to that port. If you specify this property, don't specify the DBSecurityGroupMemberships property.
